name: Get FUSE on Ethereum Using Uniswap
content: How to Get FUSE on Ethereum Using Uniswap

steps.name: Introduction
steps.content: Fuse is available on Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, and Fuse, and this guide focuses on getting FUSE on Ethereum using Uniswap.

steps.name: Step 2
steps.content: Getting FUSE on Ethereum allows for bridging the tokens to Fuse Network, which offers lower gas fees and faster transactions.

steps.name: Step 3
steps.content: Having FUSE tokens on multiple blockchains enables interoperability, expands accessibility, and increases user adoption and engagement.

steps.name: Step 4
steps.content: Tokens on different blockchains can be listed on various exchanges, enhancing liquidity and trading options for users.

steps.name: Step 5
steps.content: To get FUSE on Ethereum using Uniswap, visit the decentralized exchange and connect your MetaMask wallet.

steps.name: Step 6
steps.content: Enter the desired number of FUSE tokens to buy and confirm the swap transaction.

steps.name: Step 7
steps.content: If the FUSE token doesn't appear in your MetaMask wallet, you can manually add it using the token contract address.

steps.name: Step 8
steps.content: To bridge FUSE tokens from Ethereum to Fuse Network, follow the instructions on Voltage Finance, Fuse's leading DEX.

steps.name: Step 9
steps.content: After completing the transfer process, add Fuse Network to your MetaMask wallet using the provided details.

steps.name: Step 10
steps.content: With FUSE tokens on Fuse Network, you can participate in staking, yield farming, and other DeFi activities.

choices.content: Buy FUSE tokens from a shop
Transfer FUSE tokens from BNB Chain to Ethereum
Visit the decentralized exchange and connect your MetaMask wallet
Send a request to Fuse Network to bridge the tokens

stepItems.content: How can you get FUSE on Ethereum using Uniswap?
stepItems.explanation: To get FUSE on Ethereum using Uniswap, you need to visit the decentralized exchange and connect your MetaMask wallet.
